metadata.title: CVE-2024-45490 on Ubuntu 22.04 FIPS Compliant (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in libexpat before 2.6.3. xmlparse.c does notreject a negative length for XML_ParseBuffer.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-45490` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

expat - 2.4.7-1ubuntu0.4
libexpat1 - 2.4.7-1ubuntu0.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: expat package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.7-1ubuntu0.4').
xmlrpc-c package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
wbxml2 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
swish-e package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
insighttoolkit4 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
cadaver package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
matanza package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
tdom package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
libxmltok package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
